name: Крем для лица Невская Косметика Морковный для сухой и чувствительной кожи, 40мл
ingredients: Aqua, Olea Europaea (Olive) Oil, Isopropyl Myristate, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate,	Glycerin, Stearic Acid, Lanolin, Paraffin, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Beta-Carotene, Daucus Carota Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate, Dimethicone, Carbomer, Тriethanolamine, Parfum, BHT, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin.
